name: Carving Corusca
description: When a card with Extract is played, gain [effect0.power][ember] and [effect1.power][corrupt].
relicLoreTooltips: Wurmkin learning to master stoneform carving are often given a set of claw covers to practice. This allows them to practice stoneform etchings without a worry of damaging their own claws. Given how sturdy I've seen Wurmkin claws to be, I'd guess this "protection" is little more than vanity.

additionalTooltips.title: Extract
additionalTooltips.description: Lose [corrupt] after you play this card. If you cannot, the card cannot be played.

additionalTooltips.title: Charged Echoes
additionalTooltips.description:
Add [corrupt] by playing [infused] cards. The Wurmkin use [corrupt] to power spells and abilities.

[corrupt] can exceed [emptycorrupt] but excess [corrupt] will be removed at end of turn.

additionalTooltips.title: Extract
additionalTooltips.description: Lose [corrupt] after you play this card. If you cannot, the card cannot be played.
